Package similarity

Class SumOfDifferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • similarity.SimilarityMeasure
      • similarity.SumOfDifferences
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeanDifference
    public class SumOfDifferences
extends SimilarityMeasure
    Sum of differences of the errors. Works for both binary (in this case it will be the hamming distance) and also for grey images. Faster than MeanDifference.
    Author:
    Ã‰rick Oliveira Rodrigues (erickr@id.uff.br)
